name: ddams-audit-system
description: DANA Digital Audit Management System - Role-based audit lifecycle management

scripts.install-all: npm install && npm --prefix backend install && npm --prefix frontend install
scripts.dev: npm run dev --workspace=backend & npm run dev --workspace=frontend
scripts.build: npm run build --workspace=backend && npm run build --workspace=frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint --workspace=backend && npm run lint --workspace=frontend
scripts.format: npm run format --workspace=backend && npm run format --workspace=frontend

author: Audit Team
